name: Party Duel
description: Easy duel requests to many players at once, or auto duels with PK mode. Have fun battling your friends or enemies. Use '/pkstart' to start PK mode and '/pkend' to end it. '/partyduel' for help ingame

name: Kill Counter
description: Simple Kill Counter for GTW. '/killcounter' to see counter. '/killcounter help' for additional options. Remember to turn ON Battle Alarm and System Chat

name: Auto Match
description: Chat shortcuts for auto match content. Type '/automatch' or '/am' to see command list

name: Diet
description: Remove all food buffs script. Type '/diet'

name: Easy Buff
description: Buff script for Pardoner and Food Stalls. Type '/easybuff' to toggle auto mode.

name: Fast Sage Portal
description: Remove confirmation button for Sage shops.

name: SP Savior
description: Remove buffs that consume SP per second when a threshold is reached.

name: Warmode Paradise
description: FPS Savior like addon, but with more options.
